apps.localizedDescription:
- RedditFilter & RedditSideloadFix are made by u/level3tjg!!!
- Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings.
- Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
- Source code: 
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditFilter
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditSideloadFix
apps.name: RedditFilter
apps.subtitle: Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings

apps.localizedDescription:
Rocket not only gives you the features that are missing from Instagram, but it also gives you full control over the app.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix

FEATURES
- Browse home feed in grid layout.
- Show following status in Profile.
- Download posts from your feed.
- Repost any post from your feed.
- Long press on posts to zoom.
- Copy post captions from your feed.
- Download all Stories on Instagram.
- Save videos from IGTV.
- View Stories without notifying others.
- Mute and unmute Stories.
- Disable Auto-Advance in Stories.
- Hide Stories from your feed.
- Play in high quality on Mobile Data.
- Long press on profile photo to zoom.
- Disable read receipts in DM.
- Disable Screenshot notifications in DM.
- Disable Read Receipts in DM.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix
apps.name: Rocket for Instagram
apps.subtitle: Save posts and view stories anonymously and do much more. Requires iOS 12.4 and later.

apps.localizedDescription:
Wolf is an updated Facebook tweak with powerful features! You can access the tweak settings in Facebook's settings page.

Learn how to make your own IPA of Facebook Wolf here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/FBSideloadfix

FEATURES:
• No feed ads
• No story ads
• Disable marking messages as seen
• Disable typing status in messages
• Disable marking stories
• Disable auto-advance in stories
• Save Story images and videos
• Save Feed videos by long-pressing the video

NOTES:
• I'm not the developer of Wolf. This is not an official version of Wolf.
• Michael Lema, the developer of Wolf,  hasn't updated Wolf for a while. Expect some features may not work correctly.
apps.name: Facebook Wolf
apps.subtitle: A tweaked version of "Wolf" (made by Michael Lema). Requires iOS 12.4 and later.
apps.versionDescription: v372.0 (2.1): Updated to the latest version of Facebook app

apps.localizedDescription:
Full infomation about BHTwitterPlus (BHTwitter+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/BHTwitter-Plus_Sideloaded/

Credits: 
- BandarHL - for BHTwitter and his solution for Twitter-login (Sideload).
- haoict - developer of Twitter No Ads.
- Tanner B - solution for Skip Analytics URL (t.co).

Kwown issues:
- "Skip Analytic URL" breaks embed pictures as described here.
- Analytics link in cards can't be skipped.
- Download videos may not work if you use appdb. In that case, please change the "Identity type to use for appdb PRO" in the "appdb configuration" from Auto to Development.
apps.name: BHTwitter (deprecated)
apps.subtitle: The sideloaded version of BHTwitter, made by @BandarHL, requires iOS 13.4+ (deprecated)
apps.versionDescription:
v9.2 (2.9.2): The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/BHTwitter-Plus_Sideloaded/releases/latest
 BHTwitterPlus is now deprecated. Follow @BandarHL on Twitter (https://twitter.com/bandarhl?s=21) to get the latest version of BHTwitter.

apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with some extra features! (requires iOS 14.0 and later).

Full infomation about uYouPlus (uYou+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlus! 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus
apps.name: uYouPlus (uYou+)
apps.subtitle: A modified version of uYou with extra features! Requires iOS 14.0 and later.
apps.versionDescription:
v17.49.6 (2.3~1): The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/releases/latest

news.caption: Finally, Reddit can be sideloaded with the ability to block ads and more...
news.title: RedditFilter is out!
